snippet: A Pakistani prisoner in India was beaten by another inmate in in a Kashmir prison, Indian officials said, a day after an Indian spy was killed by fellow inmates at a Pakistani prison.
abstract: Indian officials say Pakistani prisoner in India was beaten by another inmate in Kashmir prison, day after an Indian spy was killed by fellow inmates at a Pakistani prison.
lead_paragraph: A Pakistani prisoner in India was beaten by another inmate in in a Kashmir prison, Indian officials said, a day after an Indian spy was killed by fellow inmates at a Pakistani prison.

headline.main: India: Attack on Pakistani Inmate Is Called Retaliation
headline.print_headline: India: Attack on Pakistani Inmate Is Called Retaliation
